languages.text: Каллигос Винтерскейл устроил на собственной планете охотничьи угодья, дичью в которых служат атаковавшие мир эльдары. Династия фон Валанциус могла бы протянуть руку помощи одной из сторон... Или же избавиться от обеих.

traits.locale_text: Каллигос Винтерскейл устроил на собственной планете охотничьи угодья, дичью в которых служат атаковавшие мир эльдары. Однако по воле рока он и сам сгинул в непроходимых лесах Кетца-аль Хета, потеряв связь с кораблем и верными слугами. Династия фон Валанциус могла бы протянуть руку помощи одной из сторон... Или же усмирить двух гроксов одним выстрелом.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.
languages.original_text: Каллигос Винтерскейл устроил на собственной планете охотничьи угодья, дичью в которых служат атаковавшие мир эльдары. Династия фон Валанциус могла бы протянуть руку помощи одной из сторон... Или же избавиться от обеих.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. However, as fate would have it, Calligos himself has vanished somewhere in the impassable forests of Quetza Temer and lost all contact with his ship and loyal servants. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. However, as fate would have it, Calligos himself has vanished somewhere in the impassable forests of Quetza Temer and lost all contact with his ship and loyal servants. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. However, as fate would have it, Calligos himself has vanished somewhere in the impassable forests of Quetza Temer and lost all contact with his ship and loyal servants. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale a transformé l'une de ses propres planètes en terrain de chasse et son gibier n'est autre que les Aeldaris qui ont attaqué son monde. La maison von Valancius pourrait prêter main-forte à l'une des deux parties du conflit... ou les éliminer toutes les deux en même temps.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterscale a transformé l'une de ses propres planètes en terrain de chasse et son gibier n'est autre que les Aeldaris qui ont attaqué son monde. Cependant, Calligos lui-même a disparu au milieu des forêts impénétrables de Quetza Temer et perdu tout contact avec son vaisseau et ses fidèles serviteurs. La maison von Valancius pourrait prêter main-forte à l'une des deux parties du conflit... ou les éliminer toutes les deux en même temps.

languages.text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔将家族麾下的其中一颗行星变成了狩猎场，而猎物就是袭击这个世界的艾达灵族。冯·瓦兰修斯家族可以帮助卡里戈斯或艾达灵族……也可以借着这个机会，把双方全都除掉。
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

traits.locale_text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔将家族麾下的其中一颗行星变成了狩猎场，而猎物就是袭击这个世界的艾达灵族。然而，在命运的作弄下，卡里戈斯本人却在格扎尔特默茂密的森林中迷失了方向，与虚空舰和家族的仆人失去了联系。冯·瓦兰修斯家族可以帮助卡里戈斯或艾达灵族……也可以借着这个机会，把两方全都除掉。

languages.text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは自分の惑星のひとつを狩猟場にしてしまった。そこでの獲物は惑星に攻撃を仕掛けたアエルダリである。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、この対立するどちらか一方に援助の手を差し伸べることができる…あるいは、そのどちらをも排除することができる。
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

traits.locale_text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは自分の惑星のひとつを狩猟場にしてしまった。そこでの獲物は惑星に攻撃を仕掛けたアエルダリである。ところが、運命のいたずらなのか、カリゴス本人はケツァ・テメルの通さずの森で姿を消してしまい、彼の船や忠実な従者たちとの交信も途絶えてしまった。フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、この対立するどちらか一方に援助の手を差し伸べることができる…あるいは、そのどちらをも排除することができる。

languages.text: Calligos Winterzunder hat einen seiner eigenen Planeten in ein Jagdrevier verwandelt. Die Beute besteht aus den Aeldari, die einen Angriff auf die Welt unternommen haben. Das Haus Valancius könnte einer der beiden Seiten in diesem Konflikt helfen ... oder sie beide eliminieren.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterzunder hat einen seiner eigenen Planeten in ein Jagdrevier verwandelt. Die Beute besteht aus den Aeldari, die einen Angriff auf die Welt unternommen haben. Wie das Schicksal es aber will, ist Calligos selbst irgendwo in den undurchdringlichen Wäldern auf Quetza Temer verschwunden. Sein Schiff und seine treuen Diener haben jeden Kontakt zu ihm verloren. Das Haus Valancius könnte einer der beiden Seiten in diesem Konflikt helfen ... oder sie beide eliminieren.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale ha convertido uno de sus planetas en terreno de caza. La presa son los Aeldari que atacan su planeta. La casa von Valancius podría intervenir a favor de una de las partes del conflicto... o aprovechar para eliminar a ambas.
languages.original_text: Calligos Winterscale has turned one of his own planets into hunting grounds where the game is the Aeldari who have launched an attack on the world. House von Valancius could offer a helping hand to one of the sides of this conflict... or eliminate both of them.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterscale ha convertido uno de sus planetas en terreno de caza. La presa son los Aeldari que atacan su planeta. Sin embargo, el destino ha querido que el propio Calligos desaparezca en los intransitables bosques de Quetza Temer, perdiendo el contacto con su nave y sus sirvientes. La casa von Valancius podría intervenir a favor de una de las partes del conflicto... o aprovechar para eliminar a ambas.
